name: Mercy (P. Gomes, ChristianHotte, Noah, Zanitchio)
description:
In this game, you play as a desperate diver hoping to salvage whatever riches they can from the ocean floor. However, the main thing stopping you is the local legend that they call "Mercy". Collect as much treasure as you can before you leave, but know that she has an eye on you.
